original_title: Гео Милев в лабиринта на времето
overview: February 1954: ten mass graves with over 500 bodies are found in the region of Sofia, Bulgaria. Experts say they were killed and the deaths occurred in 1925. In one of the graves a glass eye is found - the glass eye of the poet Geo Milev.
title: The Poet In The Labyrinth Of Time
